books.author: by Paul McCartney
books.description: A two-volume celebration of 154 songs, with handwritten texts, paintings and photographs from the songwriter’s archives.
books.name: THE LYRICS: 1956 TO THE PRESENT

books.author: by Philipp Dettmer
books.description: The founder of the YouTube channel Kurzgesagt gives an overview of elements of the body’s immune system.
books.name: IMMUNE

books.author: by Brian Kilmeade
books.description: The Fox News host gives an account of the relationship between Abraham Lincoln and Frederick Douglass.
books.name: THE PRESIDENT AND THE FREEDOM FIGHTER

books.author: by Dave Grohl
books.description: A memoir by the musician known for his work with Foo Fighters and Nirvana.
books.name: THE STORYTELLER

books.author: by Katie Couric
books.description: The former anchor of the “CBS Evening News” and “Today” describes some of the personal and professional challenges she faced.
books.name: GOING THERE

books.author: by Michael Imperioli and Steve Schirripa with Philip Lerman
books.description: An oral history of “The Sopranos” by two of its stars who host the podcast “Talking Sopranos.”
books.name: WOKE UP THIS MORNING

books.author: by Daniel Levy and Eugene Levy
books.description: Character profiles, major story moments and behind-the-scenes tales from the Emmy Award-winning series “Schitt's Creek.”
books.name: BEST WISHES, WARMEST REGARDS

books.author: by Huma Abedin
books.description: The aide and advisor to Hillary Clinton shares details from her time in public service as well as personal setbacks.
books.name: BOTH/AND

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Rachel Held Evans with Jeff Chu
books.description: Reflections on the identity and purpose of Christianity completed posthumously.
books.name: WHOLEHEARTED FAITH

books.author: by Bret Baier with Catherine Whitney
books.description: The Fox News chief political anchor recounts challenges faced by Ulysses S. Grant.
books.name: TO RESCUE THE REPUBLIC

books.author: by James Patterson and Matt Eversmann with Chris Mooney
books.description: A collection of stories from people working in big-city and small-town hospitals.
books.name: E.R. NURSES

books.author: by Barack Obama and Bruce Springsteen
books.description: Conversations between the 44th president and the multiple award-winning musician on a range of topics.
books.name: RENEGADES

books.author: by Bob Woodward and Robert Costa
books.description: The Washington Post journalists detail the dangers and challenges during the transition to the Biden presidency.
books.name: PERIL

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS
